inputs.selection_motivation: The influence of UK 10‑year gilt yield on GBPUSD is indirect and less robust compared to its impact on other yields and Fed policy, making it the weakest link.
inputs.motivation: The influence of UK 10‑year gilt yield on GBPUSD is indirect and less robust compared to its impact on other yields and Fed policy, making it the weakest link.

prioritized_link.motivation: UK 10‑year gilt yield is a key benchmark for global rates; its level and slope shape market expectations of future Fed rate cuts, directly influencing the probability of a Fed rate cut on 17 Sept 2025.

llm_raw_response.motivation: The influence of UK 10‑year gilt yield on GBPUSD is indirect and less robust compared to its impact on other yields and Fed policy, making it the weakest link.
